showCorrectAuto: Shows the correct answers when everyone has answered or the time runs out.
showCorrectManual: Renders a button that allows the presenter to show the correct answers.
resetSettings.description: This will reset all settings back to it's default values
noneDescription: This map shows no details at all.
mediumDescription: This map shows some details, such as land borders.
highDescription: This map has high details, showing borders and large roads.
distanceDescription: Participants will be awarded 0-100% of the points based on their distance from the location.
insideRadiusDescription: Every participant within the radius will be awarded the selected points.
closestWinsDescription: Only the closest player to the correct location will be warded points.
